title: Amazing Stories
aka: Amazing Fact and Science Fiction Stories

renewed-contributions.title: Ants
renewed-contributions.note: There is no renewal for this specific contribution, but it was reprinted from the New York Times, most likely from earlier in 1937, and the New York Times routinely renewed copyrights for its daily and Sunday issues that year.

renewed-contributions.title: Small Town
renewed-contributions.note: Renewal registration says this was published in the May 1955 issue, but it actually appeared in the May 1954 issue. Renewal is dated November 22, 1983, likely too late to be effective for the actual publication date.

renewed-contributions.title: Breakfast at Twilight
renewed-contributions.note: Renewal registration says this was published in the July 1955 issue, but it actually appeared in the July 1954 issue. Renewal is dated November 22, 1983, likely too late to be effective for the actual publication date.

renewed-contributions.title: Hunters Out of Space
renewed-contributions.note: A 1988 renewal for the author's Little Men mentions that it is a revision of work published in Amazing Stories.  It is not clear to me that its renewal covers this story, which is associated with no other renewal record, but this is one of the stories revised for Little Men.

additional-note: This magazine sometimes reprinted stories, often ones that appeared in earlier issues.  We have not systematically checked copyrights for the reprints, but the Galactic Central tables of contents note known reprints and indicate where they first appeared. The renewed contributions list above includes some (but not necessarily all) reprints from sources that have active renewals, and all renewals specifically for contributions to this magazine up to 1964.
